content.prompt: Which of the following was a similarity between Eisenhower’s and Kennedy’s arguments in the excerpts?

choices.label: Both claimed that defense policy could threaten liberty at home.
Both declared that the United States had lost international influence.
Both called for an increase in spending on military weapons and supplies.
Both asserted that communism was a threat to the United States national security.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Compare the arguments or main ideas of two sources.
